content.description: An astronaut on the International Space Station (ISS) sends a message in the form of a wave to Earth.
content.question: Which of the following types of waves could NOT be used by the astronaut to transmit the message?

topic.text: 14.1: Properties of Wave Pulses and Waves

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
